CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1950, pg. 17, reads: "Biggest Crowd in History Sees Homer Brown Take Oath as Judge... - Photos by Smith and Harris"
TitMainTitle: Woman wearing dark coat and hat, kissing or whispering to Judge Homer S. Brown, surrounded by other women, men, and police officers, in courtroom for Brown's investiture ceremony
